catalog.name: Ionosphere-Thermosphere Data Published in "Large-Scale Ionospheric Disturbances During the 17 March 2015 Storm: A Model-Data Comparative Study"

dataset.name: Ionosphere-Thermosphere Data Published in "Large-Scale Ionospheric Disturbances During the 17 March 2015 Storm: A Model-Data Comparative Study"

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - Ionosphere-Thermosphere Data Published in "Large-Scale Ionospheric Disturbances During the 17 March 2015 Storm: A Model-Data Comparative Study"(d583140)

metadata.documentation: This dataset supports the publication "Large-scale ionospheric disturbances during the 17 March 2015 storm: A model-data comparative study". The data files are selected output from the thermosphere-ionosphere-electrodynamics general circulation model (TIEGCM). The data files are model outputs from the TIEGCM simulations of the 17 March 2015 storm.
